title: Pu`ukoholƒÅ Heiau National Historic Site: Self Guided
body: Self Guided       If you wish to provide your own program for your school group while visiting the Park, no prior approval from the Park is required. Please consider the following when providing your own program:  Always ensure that your group stays on maintained trails (unless at Pelekane Beach or on the Educational field at Park Headquarters). Encourage your students and adults to practice "No Trace" principles when visiting the Park. Park rangers are available if you or your students have any questions.
